## Load Dependencies

```{r}

library("DESeq2")
library("pheatmap")
library("enrichplot")

```

# Create Matrix

```{r}
mat <- matrix(sample(1:100, 50, replace = TRUE), nrow = 5, ncol = 10)

# Define column names
colnames(mat) <- c(paste0("cond", 1:5), paste0("ctrl", 1:5))

# Define row names
rownames(mat) <- paste0("gene", 1:5)

mat
```

# Compute fold change

```{r}
# Separate condition and control columns

cond_means <- rowMeans(mat[, 1:5])
ctrl_means <- rowMeans(mat[, 6:10])

fold_change <- cond_means / ctrl_means

# Create fold change(fc) results table

fc_results <- data.frame(
Gene = rownames(mat),
Condition_Mean = cond_means,
Control_Mean = ctrl_means,
Fold_Change = fold_change
)

fc_results
```
